grails.plugin.multitenant.core.hibernate
[Groovy] Class TenantEventHandler

java.lang.Object
  TenantEventHandler

class TenantEventHandler

Class to inject hibernate events that validate multi-tenancy. These event handler methods check the annotations of the domain classes being persisted to know whether or not to force restrictions.
